ComicInfo.Title: -- If the Thunder Be Gone!; The Origin of... the Incomparable Inhumans!
ComicInfo.Summary:
-- If the Thunder Be Gone!: The weakened and hypnotized Thor helps the Circus of Crime to steal the Golden Bull. Sif and Balder watch from Asgard as the police confront Thor.
The Origin of... the Incomparable Inhumans!: Randac enters the Terrogen Mists.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:35:23. [Issue ID 21454]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
